item.title: ‘Arc Raiders’ Is Now An Even More Serious Problem For Bungie’s ‘Marathon’
item.description: Arc Raiders' big beta is over, and the numbers its put up and the vibes it amassed make it an even bigger threat to Marathon than before.

item.title: ‘Spider-Man: Brand New Day’ Spy Shots Hint At Unusual Sadie Sink Role
item.description: Who is Sadie Sink playing in Spider-Man: Brand New Day? New spy shots suggest a role that no one predicted at all.

item.title: The Ten Scariest Horror Movies According To Viewer Heart Rate
item.description: What are the scariest horror movies of all time? A new project wants to use science to figure that out, and here is its top 10 list.
